title: Man filmed violently shoving woman into side of train in totally unprovoked random attack
text:
A man was filmed pushing a girl into a subway train in Brooklyn, New York. (Picture: Twitter User Sabel_Brooke)

A man was caught on camera violently shoving a woman into the side of a train in an unprovoked random attack.

Cellphone video shows the man pushing the woman from behind, hurling her headfirst into the stopped subway train at the Dekalb Avenue station in Brooklyn, New York on Wednesday.

Just moments before assaulting the girl, the man is heard shouting ‘What! What!’ at a group of people further down the platform.

The New York Police Department is now searching for the pusher and are asking the for the public’s help to locate him.

Video of the incident was taken by Brooke Sabel, who said the woman left the station without getting any help or medical assistance.

Police told AmNewYork that the suspect jumped onto the subway tracks and ran down the tunnel after the attack. He is reportedly wanted on a charge of reckless endangerment.

Hundreds commented on the video after Sabel posted it to Twitter on Wednesday.

One Twitter user replied: ‘I’ve seen this man before.

‘He did the same exact thing a few month back on the actual train.

‘He barrelled into a dozen people and started saying “So! So! SO! I NEED MY MONEY!”‘

Many other condemned the bystanders for doing nothing to help the woman.
